bangkok-thailand.seasonal_condition: Heavy transit load in the basin can make the air feel thick during peak movement windows.
bangkok-thailand.seasonal_action: Because road pressure can stack quickly, taking BTS or MRT and finishing on foot gives the streets immediate relief.
bangkok-thailand.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

paris-france.seasonal_condition: Commuter corridors can tighten around station hubs, but average city pressure stays moderate.
paris-france.seasonal_action: Because intersections compress at peak times, metro plus short walking links keeps lanes clear for local traffic.
paris-france.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

london-uk.seasonal_condition: Road-side load rises around transfer periods, especially in central movement corridors.
london-uk.seasonal_action: Because lane pressure builds quickly in central zones, rail-first routing gives streets immediate relief.
london-uk.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

tokyo-japan.seasonal_condition: Peak transfer windows increase corridor density, while seasonal air conditions remain relatively stable.
tokyo-japan.seasonal_action: Because station corridors absorb demand efficiently, rail plus short sidewalk segments keeps pressure off road lanes.
tokyo-japan.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

new-york-us.seasonal_condition: Cross-town traffic and curb idling can create sustained road pressure through key daytime windows.
new-york-us.seasonal_action: Because road delay stacks across central corridors, subway plus short walking links gives streets immediate relief.
new-york-us.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

rome-italy.seasonal_condition: Historic center routes can saturate during overlap of commuter and visitor movement.
rome-italy.seasonal_action: Because core lanes narrow under load, tram or metro routing with short walks reduces immediate street pressure.
rome-italy.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

barcelona-spain.seasonal_condition: Coastal heat pockets and intersection volume can elevate corridor stress through midday.
barcelona-spain.seasonal_action: Because lane demand rises in midday windows, metro-to-sidewalk routing gives streets immediate relief.
barcelona-spain.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

dubai-uae.seasonal_condition: Thermal load can intensify perceived air pressure while arterial roads carry sustained daytime demand.
dubai-uae.seasonal_action: Because daytime heat and road load stack quickly, metro-first trips with short links gives streets immediate relief.
dubai-uae.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

seoul-south-korea.seasonal_condition: Fine particulate swings and transfer crowding can raise city pressure during peak movement windows.
seoul-south-korea.seasonal_action: Because transfer peaks increase lane pressure, rail priority with walking connectors gives streets immediate relief.
seoul-south-korea.source_ref: WAQI Seasonal Average + TomTom Historical Flow + GDS-Index 2026

mexico-city-mexico.seasonal_condition: Basin conditions and heavy traffic can combine into sustained atmospheric tension during high-volume periods.
mexico-city-mexico.seasonal_action: Because basin air and road congestion reinforce each other, metro and metrobus links gives streets immediate relief.
